title: String formatting crashing compiler

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```rust
   fn write_indented(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter, indent: usize) -> fmt::Result {
        write!(
            f,
            "{:indent$}{}[{}]: {}",
            indent = indent
            self.name,
            self.job_id,
            self.url,
        )?;

        for child in &self.child_components {
            child.write_indented(f, indent + 2)?;
        }

        Ok(())
    }
```

This block of code crashes the compiler.

